aboutUsPage.heroSubtitle: Our mission is to help those in need.
aboutUsPage.whatWeDoDescription1: Our platform connects individuals who need assistance with those who are willing to help. We provide a simple and transparent way to post and browse requests for essential items such as food, clothing, shelter, transportation, and medicine. Donors can view these requests and offer support directly to the individuals who need it.
aboutUsPage.missionDescription: We believe in the power of community and the importance of extending a helping hand to those in need. Our mission is to create a space where people can offer assistance directly to those who need it most, whether through essential goods or financial contributions. We strive to bridge the gap between those who can give and those in need of help.
aboutUsPage.acknowledgementDescription: We are grateful to everyone who contributed to make Laba3ed possible. A special thanks to our contributors and partners for their support and collaboration.
